quotes.message: Delay is the deadliest form of denial.
quotes.name: C. Northcote Parkinson

quotes.message: The thing about denial is that it doesn't feel like denial when it's going on.
quotes.name: Georgina Kleege

quotes.message: When denial is in play, a person simply refuses to recognize the truth, no matter how apparent.
quotes.name: Taite Adams

quotes.message: Denial is the lid on our emotional pressure cooker: the longer we leave it on, the more pressure we build up. Sooner or later, that pressure is bound to pop the lid, and we have an emotional crisis.
quotes.name: Susan Forward

quotes.message: Denial exists when three beliefs intersect: 1. It cannot happen. 2. It cannot happen to you. 3. It cannot happen to you now.
quotes.name: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.message: Denial is a common tactic that substitutes deliberate ignorance for thoughtful planning.
quotes.name: CHARLES TREMPER

quotes.message: Clouds cannot cover secret places, nor denials conceal truth.
quotes.name: Demosthenes

quotes.message: Denial does not solve the problem. Denial does not make the problem go away. Denial does not give us peace of mind, which is what we are really seeking when we engage in it. Denial is a liar. It compounds the problem, because it keeps us from seeing a solution, and taking action to resolve it.
quotes.name: BILL KORTENBACH

quotes.message: Never underestimate the power of denial.
quotes.name: Wes Bently

quotes.message: The abuse dies in a day, but the denial slays the life of the people, and entombs the hope of the race.
quotes.name: Charles Bradlaugh

quotes.message: Denial is the number one aspect of medicine. That's why people don't get check-ups.
quotes.name: Larry L. King

quotes.message: That which is denied cannot be healed.
quotes.name: Brennan Manning

quotes.message: God's delay is not God's denial.
quotes.name: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.message: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.name: Simon Travaglia

quotes.message: Denial of one appetite sharpens the others.
quotes.name: Mason Cooley

quotes.message: It takes a lot of courage to face up to things you can't do because we feed ourselves so much denial.
quotes.name: Zoe Saldana

quotes.message: Denial is a very powerful thing.
quotes.name: Jane Velez-Mitchell

quotes.message: Remember to be honest with yourself. Denial is how we often get stuck in the same place in life.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Denial is the way we handle what we cannot handle.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: I think denial's fascinating. It's a jokey word, but it really happens, and sometimes in enormous ways.
quotes.name: Marian Keyes

quotes.message: The greatest barrier to someone achieving their potential is their denial of it.
quotes.name: Antje Traue

quotes.message: More people would learn from their mistakes if they weren't so busy denying them.
quotes.name: Harold J. Smith

quotes.message: Denial is the worst form of truth.
quotes.name: Ella The Wise and powerful

quotes.message: Denial is useful defense mechanism until it's not.
quotes.name: Rosalind Kaplan

quotes.message: Denial does not change reality for everyone else. Only for the one denying and those who are foolish enough to believe the fantasy.
quotes.name: Elle Casey

quotes.message: Being in denial never resolved any problem for anyone, anywhere.
quotes.name: Muhammed Haider

quotes.message: No denial of the truth will ever invalidate it.
quotes.name: Nikki Rosen

quotes.message: At first, they'll only dislike what you say, but the more correct you start sounding the more they'll dislike you.
quotes.name: Criss Jami

quotes.message: Denial is the worst kind of lie...because it is the lie you tell yourself.
quotes.name: Michelle A. Homme

quotes.message: Denial and inactivity prepare people well for the roles of victim and corpse.
quotes.name: John Leach

quotes.message: Living in denial only makes accepting the truth that much harder.
quotes.name: Jules F.

quotes.message: As the fear of God is the beginning of wisdom, so the denial of God is the height of foolisnes.
quotes.name: R.C. Sproul

quotes.message: Refusal to believe until proof is given is a rational position; denial of all outside of our own limited experience is absurd.
quotes.name: Annie Besant

quotes.message: The speed of the human mind is remarkable. So is its inability to face the obvious.
quotes.name: SIMON MAWER

quotes.message: The worst lies are the lies we tell ourselves. We live in denial of what we do, even what we think. We do this because we're afraid.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Denial ain't just a river in Egypt.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Most men would rather deny a hard truth than face it.
quotes.name: George R.R. Martin

quotes.message: The easiest way to solve a problem is to deny it exists.
quotes.name: Isaac Asimov

quotes.message: Better a friendly denial than unwilling compliance.
quotes.name: PROVERBS

quotes.message: It is not necessary to deny another's reality in order to affirm your own.
quotes.name: Anne Wilson Schaef

quotes.message: One picture is worth 1,000 denials.
quotes.name: Ronald Reagan

quotes.message: Denial, perhaps, is a necessary human mechanism to cope with the heartaches of life.
quotes.name: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.message: The road of denial leads to the precipice of destruction.
quotes.name: John Bunyan

quotes.message: What state do you live in? Denial.
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: Underneath all that denial, you're someone who's deeply, deeply nice.
quotes.name: David Levithan

quotes.message: Denial is an ugly thing.
quotes.name: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.message: Denial, they say, stands for Don't even notice I am lying. Human beings are the only animals who are happily lied to by our own minds about what is actually happening around us.
quotes.name: Cesar Millan

quotes.message: I would rather have regrets of excess than regrets of denial.
quotes.name: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.message: Denial is a wall in which love hides behind.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Self-denial is indulgence of a propensity to forego.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: The denial of our duty to act in this case is a denial of our right to act; and if we have no right to act, then may we well be termed the white slaves of the North, for like our brethren in bonds, we must seal our lips in silence and despair.
quotes.name: Angelina Grimke

quotes.message: Those who deny the existence of the truth postulate the truth of their denial and plainly contradict themselves.
quotes.name: Antonio Machado

quotes.message: The only atheism is the denial of truth.
quotes.name: Arthur Lynch

quotes.message: I find I am constantly being encouraged to pluck out some one aspect of myself and present this as the meaningful whole, eclipsing or denying the other parts of self.
quotes.name: Audre Lorde

quotes.message: It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept.
quotes.name: Bill Watterson

quotes.message: Denial helps us to pace our feelings of grief. There is a grace in denial. It is nature's way of letting in only as much as we can handle.
quotes.name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quotes.message: Deny any part of Reality, and you will lose your awareness of all of It.
quotes.name: ELIZABETH A. CRONKHITE

quotes.message: You can't get away from yourself by moving from one place to another.
quotes.name: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.message: Where justice is denied, where poverty is enforced, where ignorance prevails, and where any one class is made to feel that society is an organized conspiracy to oppress, rob and degrade them, neither persons nor property will be safe.
quotes.name: Frederick Douglass

quotes.message: Denial was a weapon; it killed truth, numbed the mind, and I was a junkie.
quotes.name: John Hart

quotes.message: The conflict between the will to deny horrible events and the will to proclaim them aloud is the central dialectic of psychological trauma.
quotes.name: Judith Lewis Herman

quotes.message: Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life. It turns what we have into enough, and more. It turns denial into acceptance, chaos to order, confusion to clarity. It can turn a meal into a feast, a house into a home, a stranger into a friend.
quotes.name: Melody Beattie

quotes.message: Dreams of innocence are just that; they usually depend on a denial of reality that can be its own form of hubris.
quotes.name: Michael Pollan

quotes.message: The trouble with denial is that when the truth comes, you aren't ready.
quotes.name: Nina LaCour

quotes.message: To regret one’s own experiences is to arrest one’s own development. To deny one’s own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one’s own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: I could deny it if I liked. I could deny anything if I liked.
quotes.name: Oscar Wilde

quotes.message: Even as your body betrays you, your mind denies it.
quotes.name: Sara Gruen

quotes.message: Denial is like an old blanket. I loved to get on under that thing and curl up and sleep.
quotes.name: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.message: A man who denies his past is a man who truly denies himself a future, for he refuses to know himself, and to deny knowledge of oneself is to stumble through life as handicapped as the blind mute.
quotes.name: Tobsha Learner

quotes.message: Most people find facts irritating. Facts interfere with their systems of denial.
quotes.name: Walter Darby Bannard
